## `Features`

- C.R.U.D. for options:
  - Customers
  - Products
  - Expenses
  - Centers Cost
  - Categories
  - Sales
  - Users

## `Relations`

```
  sales
  ^---^
  |   |
  |   +--> products sold
  +--> customer
```

```
  expenses
  ^------^
  |      |
  |      +--> categories
  +--> center cost
```

```
  products
  ^------^
         |
         +--> center cost

```

```
  products sold
  ^-----------^
              |
              +--> products

```
